content: I am wondering y'all -- I think we should upload our page on the compiler-team repository a bit
mostly I'm just thinking of adding links to the various hackmd docs for the time being, I guess

ideally I think we would have:

  • here is our overall roadmap, the main things we are trying to do
  • here are notes from our meetings
  • here is the evolving documentation and guidelines
and perhaps a blog post or two on the inside-rust blog
but I don't want to invest too much energy/time into it, want to save that for the work itself
I guess trying to keep things to the minimum work required meanwhile being able to keep everyone else informed is good
that's more or less why minutes and videos would also help I guess
